text: Overman may refer to: ==Entertainment== * Overman (film), a 2015 South Korean film *Overman King Gainer, a Japanese anime television series *Overman, an alternative version of Superman in DC Comics ==Other uses== *Overman (surname) *Friedrich Nietzsche's concept of the Ãœbermensch, occasionally translated "Overman" (as opposed to, e.g., "Superman") *A supervisor, particularly in the coal mining industry *Overman Act, an American law that increased presidential power during World War I *The Overman Committee, a subcommittee of the United States Senate *Overman rearrangement, a chemical reaction *Overman Wheel Company, an American bicycle manufacturer
title: Overman
